name: It is not real (TheRealWlad, Lichstars)
description:
There was a story about burnout and helping yourself. But unfortinually we had to make the game in only part of the time :D Now its just a random collection of horror scenarios.

Movement:

  • WASD
  • F -> flashlight
  • LMB -> attack
  • ESC -> open menu

How to "Install":

Windows: unzip -> start the `ItIsNotReal.exe`

Linux: unzip ->  `chmox +x ItIsNotReal.x86_64 ` -> just run it

More Info:

A html build was not possible because of the usage of complex lighting and effects in the timeframe of the game jam.
